scripts.restore: dnu restore src/BackendDotNet.Library && dnu restore src/BackendDotNet.CLI && dnu restore src/BackendDotNet.Tests && dnu restore src/BackendDotNet.Web
scripts.compile: dnu build src/BackendDotNet.Library && dnu build src/BackendDotNet.CLI && dnu build src/BackendDotNet.Tests && dnu build src/BackendDotNet.Web
scripts.build: npm run restore && npm run compile
